author: usurper9678
content: Hi everyone! I am very new to these concepts (I am a student), but I have keen interest in learning about the crypto and blockchain. It would be really helpful if someone gave a brief description of what this server is about, like can we learn things here or is this a development server for those who are well-versed in crypto and stuff.

author: abcoathup
content:
Check the <#745072678079168654> message: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/745072678079168654/745076277265825802
This server is for Ethereum R&D, if you are interested in core development you can learn a lot by reading the various channels.  If you want to be involved at the application layer, there are other servers for that.
